remarks: Rearrange arguments in a commutative, associative operation. (Contributed by NM, 26-Aug-1995.)
statement:
caov.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
caov.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
caov.3 $e |- C e. _V $.
caov.com $e |- ( x F y ) = ( y F x ) $.
caov.ass $e |- ( ( x F y ) F z ) = ( x F ( y F z ) ) $.
caov.4 $e |- D e. _V $.
caov42 $p |- ( ( A F B ) F ( C F D ) ) = ( ( A F C ) F ( D F B ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C x y z $.
$d D x y z $.
$d F x y z $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
